messages.content: Name monuments in Berlin worth visiting

1. Brandenburg Gate (Brandenburger Tor)
2. Reichstag Building (Reichstag)
3. Holocaust Memorial ( Holocaust Memorial)
4. museums (Museen)
5. Tiergarten (Tiergarten)
6. cafes and restaurants (Cafés & Restaurants)
7. parks (Parks)
8. alt-zoos (Alt-Zoos)
9. theaters (Theaters)
10. clubs (Clubs)
List most interesting churches in Berlin.

1. St. Peter's Church (Peterskirche)
2. St. John's Church (Johnskirche)
3. Frauenkirche (Frauenkirche)
4. Deutscher Dom (Deutscher Dom)
5. Auguststrasse Synagogue (Auguststrasse Synagogue)
6. Turkish State Mosque (Türkische Staatsmoschee)
7. Berliner Dom (Berliner Dom)
8. Topography of Terror (Topografie des Terror)
9. Jewish Cemetery (Jüdische Cemetery)
10. Neukölln Synagogue (Neukölln Synagogue)

I'm sorry, but I don't have specific locations of churches in Berlin. Churches are usually located in specific neighborhoods or areas in Berlin, and I don't have information about individual churches. If you're interested in visiting a specific church in Berlin, I recommend checking its website or contacting the church directly for information.
